enhanced_description: ZingHR is India’s premier Human Capital Management (HCM) Platform, recognized as an emerging leader in cutting-edge HR technology and expertise in comprehensive HR solutions. Operating with a mission to empower the workforce and improve business outcomes, ZingHR re-architects enterprise HR tech for profitability, people, and planet. The platform aims to elevate HR operations and strategy by offering a comprehensive suite of services from ‘Hire to Rehire’, meticulously tailored for specific business needs. ZingHR incorporates innovative technologies such as Blockchain Data Management Systems for data integrity, Face-ID for authentication, Zero-touch Payroll for efficient processing, Digital onboarding, chatbots, and AI-powered Robotic Interviews. Leveraging machine learning, the solution helps navigate hiring challenges by reducing slow decision-making, lack of transparency, and personal bias in recruitment. Furthermore, ZingHR supports employee growth and development through integrated Learning Management System (LMS) and Performance Management System (PMS) tools, enabling better career navigation and skill development.
